lines: 'Mupa-shi kufuma ku mulu, Winga fumye mfifi
E-nda mu lubuto, E-nda mu lubuto,
E-nda mu lubuto, Mu lubuto ulwa Mfumu.
2. Enda mu lubuto lwe landwe, shiwi lya kwa Lesa,
3. Na-ngu mwabe mfifi ‘mo leya, Enda mu lubuto,
Mfifi ‘letina ulubuto, Ku kwisa kwa Mfumu.
Kumu-temwa pano pa ca-lo, Cikacila kulya
